scripts.title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
scripts.text: Now we've got a tune that poses quite the question for us ladies out there - where do good men go, anyway? Here's Cass Daley with A Good Man is Hard to Find.

scripts.title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
scripts.text: Ladies, let me ask you this: what makes a good man? With lyrics like these reminding us that it takes effort and patience in the search for true love - well then… I suppose he must be worth every second! Here's Cass Daley with A Good Man Is Hard to Find.

scripts.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
scripts.text: Can you imagine dreaming up an entire life, just from one little kiss? That's what this song is all about. Here's Louis Armstrong with the soulful ballad - A Kiss to Build a Dream On.

scripts.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
scripts.text: Dreaming of the future, building on love and affection? Well then this next song is for you. Give me a kiss before I leave… or so goes one lyric in Louie Armstong's heartfelt ballad about cherishing every moment with that special someone. Here it is from us to all your loves out there - Louis Armstrong singing 'A Kiss To Build A Dream On'.

scripts.title: A Room With a View
scripts.text: Well, this next one makes me think about home and coziness. Who wouldn't want someone wonderful right outside your door? It feels like the perfect sentiment for after such an uncertain time out there in that post-war wasteland we've been living through. Here's Artie Shaw with A Room With a View.

scripts.title: A Room With a View
scripts.text: The sweet serenade of love and longing, courtesy of the great Artie Shaw. This next tune takes us on an intimate journey through windows to wonderful yous - our own secret dreams made flesh in someone special. Here is Master Swing himself with 'A Room With a View'.

scripts.title: Address Unknown
scripts.text: I wonder if there are folks out in the wasteland listening to us right now, dreaming of those they've lost contact with. Maybe their address is unknown too. Here's hoping this song resonates with them - it's The Ink Spots performing 'Address Unknown'.

scripts.title: Address Unknown
scripts.text: The longing, the regret… this song says it all. What more can be said when you've been apart and your heart still yearns for that special someone? Here are The Ink Spots with their powerful plea of devotion - let me try to reach my love at …Address Unknown!

scripts.title: Ain't Misbehavin'
scripts.text: Folks, I gotta wonder - what did it mean to "misbehave" back when this tune was written? Wasn't life already a bit of chaos and upheaval after the war ended? Anyway, here is that playful piano man Fats Waller with Ain't Misbehavin'.

scripts.title: Ain't Misbehavin'
scripts.text: Ladies and gentlemen of the Mojave, get ready to kick your heels up high as I introduce a tune that embodies pure unadulterated joy! With its carefree spirit and playful lyrics about breaking all sorts of rules, this Fats Waller number is guaranteed to have you grinning from ear to ear. Here's Ain't Misbehavin' straight ahead for New Vegas tonight!

scripts.title: All of Me
scripts.text: I wonder if there isn't just something special about surrendering your whole heart, like what she does here in this ballad. It takes a certain kind of courage to be that vulnerable… Here is the incomparable Billie Holiday with 'All of me'.

scripts.title: All of Me
scripts.text: In the spirit of love and vulnerability, I'd like to play something really special for you right now because giving all that we are is what makes life truly meaningful. Here's Billie Holiday with her iconic song about surrendering one's heart fully - take a listen as she pours out All of Me on Radio New Vegas tonight!

scripts.title: All Or Nothing At All
scripts.text: Billie Holiday sings about the extremes of love - either all in, or nothing at all. If that half-hearted stuff won't cut it for her heart… Here is Billie with "All Or Nothing At All".

scripts.title: All Or Nothing At All
scripts.text: This song is a soulful, passionate plea for all or nothing - no half measures when it comes to love. It's the ultimate declaration of devotion and if your heart can't fully commit… well then maybe better not at all. Here's Billie Holiday with 'All Or Nothing At All'.

scripts.title: American Patrol
scripts.text: I wonder if folks out there in the radio wasteland, maybe some Vault dwellers tuning in on a stray signal, will recognize this familiar march. It was played at parades and patriotic events back when our country felt safer than it does now - but music has a way of bridging gaps between eras. Here's Glenn Miller with American Patrol.

scripts.title: American Patrol
scripts.text: Glenn Miller's signature sound takes us on a nostalgic journey through the heart of America. Here, in his iconic arrangement "American Patrol", we find ourselves marching to an anthem celebrating our nation and its people. It's Glenn Miller with American Patrol!

scripts.title: Another Saturday Night (take)
scripts.text: I wonder if this song captures a scene many of us know all too well - another weekend night, dancing the blues away from life outside these walls. Here's Sam Cooke with that soulful take on "Another Saturday Night".

scripts.title: Anything Goes
scripts.text: Anything seems to be going in this tune, like it always has. Here's the one and only Cole Porter crooning anything goes!

scripts.title: Anything Goes
scripts.text: Anything goes, they say - freedom reigns in every way! Here to prove it is the legendary songsmith himself, Mr. Cole Porter, crooning his iconic tune about breaking all social rules: anything truly does go when love takes over as he shows us with 'Cole Porter's Anything Goes'.
